projects.name: Python Hangman Game
projects.description: Programmed a command-line Hangman game in Python as an introductory project to explore fundamental programming concepts. This early work laid the groundwork for subsequent projects in advanced programming language

projects.name: Java Hangman Game with GUI
projects.description: Designed and implemented an interactive Hangman game in Java, featuring a custom user interface built with JFrame. Incorporated object-oriented programming principles to ensure a robust and user-friendly gaming experience.

projects.name: Java Bank Application
projects.description: Engineered custom data structures (linked lists, AVL trees, etc.) within a Java bank application to streamline record management, enabling sophisticated sorting, searching, and merging operations via a console interface

projects.name: Design and built Computers
projects.description: Built nine custom computers for personal use and friends using PCPartPicker. Involved in selecting compatible components, assembling hardware, installing operating systems, and optimizing performance for various applications, including gaming and productivity. This experience enhanced my technical skills and attention to detail

job duties.job duty: Managed a small team promoting moral and physical health while performing daily duties.
Facilitated the maintenance of 18 million dollars worth of highly sensitive equipment.
Trained soldiers on AN/TPQ-53 R.A.D.A.R. system operations, map reading, vehicle PCMS, and NVG operation
Installed satellite dishes and troubleshot cable issues for customers during their time of need.
Guided customers in selecting the ideal smart home solutions tailored to their needs.
